message: I've found the functionality of MPTT trees very useful, but the admin for these models always leads to headaches. Django-CMS uses a nice changelist, but it isn't useable for models other than its own Page (not to mention the bundled mptt is a huge headache). The latest versions of django-mptt come with a model admin that requires FeinCMS.
Would be great to have a drop-in app that supported both those libs though.

Looks like there has been a fair amount of activity on the treebeard admin, might be worth a look as a starting point if you aren't already tied to mptt: https://github.com/tabo/django-treebeard/commits/master/treebeard/admin.py
I've looked around in the past (at least several months ago at this point) and not seen anything.
I've created a somewhat stand-alone admin in my django-categories package. The editor package was originally extracted from FeinCMS. Code at https://github.com/callowayproject/django-categories
@coordt I will definitely check this out, thank you!
